kv5.3:2.7: Hañci kusalaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:3.1: ☑ Anicce niccanti vipariyeso, so ca akusaloti?
kv5.3:3.3: Pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:3.7: asubhe subhanti vipariyeso, so ca akusaloti?
kv5.3:3.9: Pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:4.1: ☑ Pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:4.3: Anicce niccanti vipariyeso, so ca kusaloti?
kv5.3:4.5: pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:4.9: asubhe subhanti vipariyeso, so ca kusaloti?
kv5.3:5.5: Hañci arahā pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:6.1: ☑ Pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, arahā pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjeyyāti?
kv5.3:8.3: Hañci natthi arahato saññāvipariyeso cittavipariyeso diṭṭhivipariyeso, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:9.6: Tena hi pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇanti.
kv5.3:10.3: Nanu pathavī atthi, atthi ca koci pathaviṃ pathavito samāpajjatīti?
kv5.3:10.5: Hañci pathavī atthi, atthi ca koci pathaviṃ pathavito samāpajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:11.1: ☑ Pathavī atthi, pathaviṃ pathavito samāpajjantassa viparītaṃ hotīti?
kv5.3:11.3: Nibbānaṃ atthi, nibbānaṃ nibbānato samāpajjantassa viparītaṃ hotīti?
